attributes.action: Ban lorries from overtaking on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently lorries two abreast, one overtaking the other, cause long delays for other drivers on motorways while the open road stretches ahead of the lorries, they are also a major cause of accidents.

Ban lorries from overtaking on motorways - keep them to one lane.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
